TEXT.TITLE: EQUITICORP HOLDING IN GUINNESS REACHES 59.93 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Equiticorp Holdings Ltd <EQUW.WE> now owns or has received acceptances representing 59.93 pct of the issued ordinary share capital of Guinness Peat Group Plc <GNSP.L>, Equiticorp said in a statement. Equiticorp's offer for Guinness Peat became unconditional on October 3, when it had 50.6 pct, and closed on October 17. REUTER
